org.springframework.http

Interface HttpMessage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClientHttpRequest, ClientHttpResponse, HttpInputMessage, HttpOutputMessage, HttpRequest, ServerHttpRequest, ServerHttpResponse
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClientHttpRequest, AbstractClientHttpResponse, HttpRequestWrapper, MockClientHttpRequest, MockClientHttpResponse, MockHttpInputMessage, MockHttpOutputMessage, RequestPartServletServerHttpRequest, ServletServerHttpRequest, ServletServerHttpResponse

    public interface HttpMessage
    Represents the base interface for HTTP request and response messages. Consists of HttpHeaders, retrievable via getHeaders().
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Arjen Poutsma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpHeaders getHeaders()
      Return the headers of this message.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeaders

        HttpHeaders getHeaders()
        Return the headers of this message.
        Returns:
        a corresponding HttpHeaders object
